mapper.insert: insert into FAQ(faq_num, faq_category, faq_sub, faq_id, faq_content) values ( faq_seq.nextval, #{faq_category}, #{faq_sub}, #{faq_id}, #{faq_content} )
mapper.select: select faq_num, faq_category, faq_sub, faq_regdate, faq_status from FAQ where faq_num > 0 order by faq_num desc, faq_regdate desc
mapper.update: update FAQ set faq_category=#{faq_category} , faq_sub=#{faq_sub} , faq_content=#{faq_content} where faq_num = #{faq_num}
